3.xukumatro zarur ast,ki dar nazdi raisi Cumxur muSoviri kalon oidi masYalaxoi siyosii manotikxoi kuxiston taSkil namoyad, va bevosita in muSovir boyad be mienarav bo raisi Cumxur doim dar tamos boSad.

2) ba gayr az imzoi guzoStan dar soziSnomai sulxi toCikon boz Ci saxme baroi ruSti toCikistoni azizamon guzoStaed?

tu dodar dori yo nadori?
